props.disabled: Puts all children inputs into a disabled state.
props.lazyValidation: If enabled, **valid** will always be `true` unless there are visible validation errors. You can still call `validate()` to manually trigger validation.
props.readonly: Puts all children inputs into a readonly state.
props.valid: A boolean value representing the validity of the form.

emits.update:valid: Emitted when the valid prop updated.
